title: (x) Slightly serifed italic sans architectural lettering - Base Nine {T Connel}
content:
Found this face last year on the signage for the new convention center in Council Bluffs, Iowa. Anyone have any ideas? Looks familiar but I can't place it.

Thanks,  
Brad.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [10-12-06\_1516.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101028142158/http:/typophile.com/files/10-12-06_1516.jpg) | 35.27 KB |
| [10-12-06\_1510.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101028142158/http:/typophile.com/files/10-12-06_1510.jpg) | 10.04 KB |
author: dicharry

comments.content:
Looks like Emigre Base Nine  
edit: Specifically Base Nine Small Caps Italic in all lower case
Yeah, I agree. Base Nine bold italic.

aha!

i am familiar with base nine and twelve, but have never set anything in the small caps italic.

indeed a perfect match.

thanks!
